Name: Vow of the Far Sea
Description:
"Withdraw, withdraw, yet there always remain the unyielding reefs.
That is the ocean's silent vow, standing firmly on the shore forever.
The shield bears the waves, embracing the surge without resistance.
With every impact, it endures alongside the sea, without end.
It grants peace to the soul, so the brave may walk without fear.
In the eternal sound of the tide, protection becomes an endless poem."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths V")
Description2: When equipped, the weapon's appearance will be replaced with: Vow of the Far Sea.
